name: Witchwarper - Spells list
content:
0-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.IVvO4mcUq3NwLJ9f]{Charming Veneer} Give a creature a bonus to Charisma-based checks, and speed its gathering of information.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.KaIbA9BCQfEagPsO]{Churn Fluid} Change the chemical composition of up to 1 bulk of liquid per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rSWg5JnN3mxzkatD]{Dancing Lights} Create and direct up to four lights.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.cmD9XPyg0Cud1xYO]{Daze} Humanoid creature of CR 3 or lower is dazed.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3dnHuCrUs9SfZjqG]{Dazzling Flares} Create bursts of distracting flares, imposing a –2 penalty on Perception checks made in the area.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic} Detect spells and magic items within 60 feet.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xCtwxPiV5ionTNal]{Fatigue} Touched creature is fatigued.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.J1k3B5PmIc4SUC9L]{Ghost Sound} Create minor illusory sounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.0v9JgXN6rI4sr975]{Grave Words} Force a corpse to babble.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.lop1wIJ0m6dbuN6I]{Hazard} Deal 1d3 acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage in a 5-foot-radius burst.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.QAU3felak3Etp6t1]{Mending} Restore 1d4 Hit Points to an object or construct.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.byAI5MUa3DgiiXc9]{Psychokinetic Hand} Telekinetically move an object of 1 bulk or less.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kNURbWD9d5768exU]{Token Spell} Perform simple magical effects.

 

1st-Level

Acidic Mist: You call forth the corrosive atmosphere of a gas giant to damage your opponents.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xQJexGLmCYF7VTdw]{Akashic Download} You do a cosmic search of the Akashic Record for information about a topic.

Akashic Tutor: You communicate with the Akashic Record of one of your classmates or former instructors, asking them to assist you in a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.6BH1w6ViKLDwYLV0]{Build Trust} You get a sense of the best way to interact with the target to encourage positive regard toward you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3nFCrisRp2GIjbR3]{Charm Person} Make one humanoid creature believe that it is your ally.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zxecXzHipD4MEoFc]{Comprehend Languages} You understand all spoken, signed, and written or tactile languages.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.infpQZm0h1FzN7YX]{Confusion, Lesser} One living creature is confused for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.moyeAHT4yzZVWmmg]{Detect Thoughts} “Listen” to surface thoughts.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{Disguise Self} Change your appearance.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.r1gHWr2umxcDXHEX]{Enduring Worlds} Extend the infinite worlds feature’s duration.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.cOz93scOEdNFObSm]{Erase} Remove writings of either magical or mundane nature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Frighten a single living creature that's of CR 4 or lower for 1d4 rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} One creature or object per level falls slowly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xPgI0T3aaPQnHE2Y]{Grease} Make a 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XeeMyCERluyRvjOt]{Hold Portal} Hold a door shut.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.PlIKBubNljqxVPsz]{Identify} Gain a +10 bonus to identify items of a magic or technological nature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yFhvmdW0BnMHV3Sm]{Jolting Surge} Touch deals 4d6 electricity damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.VI3PTc7yoywykyl3]{Junk Shards} You summon sharp fragments of technological junk that fly toward your target and deal 3d6 piercing and slashing damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2l5Xk1YMzp0hlUok]{Life Bubble} Encase targeted creatures with a shell of tolerable atmosphere.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.BrRuThVTv1aNfUKH]{Mental Silence} You create an anti-telepathic field around yourself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.a2zXJ84rzkD8SIBe]{Overheat} Deal 2d8 fire damage to creatures in cone.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.fd635J8PEBfOt3Lx]{Puncture Veil} Tiny needles deal damage plus additional bleed damage for 3 rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yBQ7jy3qf2Q9wkRc]{Quick Change} Adjacent creatures who are unaware of your true form are flat-footed until the beginning of their next turn.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.tzBzAK2mkdtaTRXw]{Remove Condition, Lesser} Remove one minor harmful condition affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AZBzNyXpBU1yaE5r]{Scan Environment} You analyze the naturally occurring environment in the area, learning the state of the atmosphere, biomes, and gravity.

Shared Evolution: You must be a barathu to learn this spell. When you cast it, you activate your early stage adaptation while also extending it to your allies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.9wFUs5AW8Wq8n4RL]{Shifting Surge} A creature or weapon can deal a different type of energy damage as well as extra damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.t8QVxG4WCnd0a9QM]{Shrink Object} You shrink the target item, transmuting it into a smaller version of itself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.IsaK6O4pvrRLbEEi]{Verdant Code} You turn data into plant matter that either instantly explodes outward or lurks within a device.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dIlKtUGGKcur6OaK]{Wisp Ally} Create wisp of energy that shines light and distracts an enemy.

 

2nd-Level

Akashic Tutor: You communicate with the Akashic Record of one of your classmates or former instructors, asking them to assist you in a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4MJMFISvSHl8p82D]{Alter Corpse} You cause a corpse to change to suit a narrative you choose.

Alter Enhancement: You tap into the multiverse and find a reality with a forgotten object similar to the target of this spell, swapping that item with the target item.

Amorphous Form: Your body briefly shifts into an amorphous form, enabling you to circumvent certain attacks and squeeze through tight spaces.

Atavistic Howl: You release a howl of primal rage, echoing the pain of Dreamers awoken by injury.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uH3JWy7ICH8DNS8m]{Augury} Learn whether an action will be good or bad.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

Benevolent Synesthesia: You transform the target’s brain, allowing them to see sounds, hear scents, and otherwise perceive sensory input using multiple sensory organs.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nK0OS9Fn5ueJ3aOi]{Caustic Conversion} Fling magical nanites as a ranged attack that deals 4d4 acid damage to one target, plus 5 additional damage in subsequent rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.jpx99euQYR6RfQAc]{Dampening Field} The target becomes encased in a field that dampens sounds and vibrations.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.l0jjaYzYskb9omJb]{Daze Monster} Target living creature of CR 5 or lower is dazed.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.HzCGLOfSmLZokppJ]{Ectoplasmic Snare} You launch a writhing tendril of ectoplasm to snare a creature. Make a ranged attack roll against your target’s EAC.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.9fN20FGd94L3DXOr]{Ego Whip} You overwhelm your opponent’s ego, diminishing its sense of self, hope, and confidence.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Frighten multiple creatures of CR 4 or lower for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} One creature or object per level falls slowly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.UVzRPQeiV2yl6QAn]{Fog Cloud} Create a fog that obscures vision.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wYkD8HZaenhB8xts]{Force Blast} Cone deals 2d6 force damage and bull rushes creatures.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.W0oa8tqHXAcWNaGT]{Hold Person} Paralyze one humanoid.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.YDXegEus8p0BnsH1]{Invisibility} Target is invisible for 1 minute per level or until it attacks.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zeW5xSSB5YtzL0gT]{Knock} Opens a locked or magically sealed door.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.fiFr41dYjlAxJlwn]{Make Whole} Restore 5d6 Hit Points to an object or construct.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.qpyB7SxHlTBx0H6a]{Mirror Image} Create decoy duplicates of yourself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.lch6DgzxMdDgK3PZ]{Parallel Form} Disguise creatures’ forms and equipment, and give targets a bonus to Bluff checks to impersonate individuals

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wlvVM7LgOJ7HVCr8]{Personal Gravity} You alter gravity’s effects on you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dL6LXqYEVeWdCxgf]{Reality Leap} Hop through to another spot within range in this reality with a 50% chance to arrive slightly off target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wMBxnYkNbzWJklIB]{Remove Condition} Remove one moderate harmful condition affecting a creature.

School Spirit: In your time of need, you call upon a spirit of your school to help you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.5aW793TGgd3Kd4Fe]{See Invisibility} See invisible creatures or objects.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.t8QVxG4WCnd0a9QM]{Shrink Object} You shrink the target item, transmuting it into a smaller version of itself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.MmPKosFJAHgEbz6u]{Slice Reality} Tear gashes in reality, dealing 2d6 damage to all targets or 2d6 damage plus staggering a single target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ZsRv2Vcl2iamrcCt]{Song Of The Cosmos} Creatures near you must succeed at a Will saving throw or be fascinated for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Mn5F4th3ctW5oKJ4]{Status} Monitor condition and position of allies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.GQeKJki7ErOP4qUi]{Venomous Weapon} You touch a weapon that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage and imbue it with poison.

 

3rd-Level

Accelerated Adaptation: You grant a barathu increased control over its own powers of adaptation.

Akashic Tutor: You communicate with the Akashic Record of one of your classmates or former instructors, asking them to assist you in a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.LITa6PICWCJvYiQV]{Antiradiation} Calm an area of radiation, the strength of which depends on your caster level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.J6TKSw3AuZfwNW0A]{Arcane Sight} Magical sources become visible to you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.SysRFlYml1f1Eofd]{Charm Monster} Make one creature believe it is your ally or one day per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4Z6WeMM9uJ1U0wG6]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} Hear or see at a distance for 1 minute per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.KQ4vSfG9tq8EJxir]{Dispel Magic} Cancel one magical spell or effect.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kcIcN01XehzRe4Ui]{Displacement} Attacks miss target 50% of the time.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.WdVuZELNzMaNqE6j]{Entropic Grasp} Touch decays a construct or non-magical manufactured item once per round per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.S8cNpjd2gMJ6lffz]{Etheric Shards} You harden ethereal matter into interplanar blades that are invisible to those who cannot see into the Ethereal Plane.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.WP0QPu6QvApGaQIG]{Explosive Blast} Deal 9d6 fire damage to creatures in a 20-foot radius.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Targets of CR 8 or lower within a cone are panicked for 1 minute.

Fey Pranksters: You summon a 10-foot-by-10-foot swarm of mischievous fey creatures armed with various tiny weapons who fly around chaotically.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} One creature or object per level falls slowly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.y9YQXmyA82gXnRGN]{Glimpse Of Truth} This spell functions as true seeing, except as noted.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.PecEOjojT15BJKi9]{Haste} One creature per level moves and acts faster.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.8FNA793CY1hNWUEP]{Id Insinuation} By invading targets with your psychic presence, you isolate parts of their minds, preventing them from functioning in a coherent manner.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.vOQ1NkfDHafdqTfE]{Irradiate} Flood area with dangerous radiation.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.qZwiwVn1VdlTX71E]{Meticulous Match} You compare two similar items and know if they are identical to one another or not.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Et8svAkPZ7RNsJJf]{Nondetection} Hide target from divination and surveillance.

P@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1LuBpdmEkFgCF2Mv]{Planned Obsolescence} You transform a weapon or suit of armor into an antique version of itself, giving it the analog and archaic properties.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wB957SDHp5jkTR4F]{Polar Vortex} You generate an arctic storm of harsh winds and battering hail and snow.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.q2YBkQjYHafQ6pVF]{Prescience} Concentrate on an enemy, predict their actions, and prepare an appropriate response.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.6Bjgrnq4u8GHuvB8]{Preserve Specimen} You harmlessly render a willing or unconscious living creature inert, placing it in stasis where it does not need to eat, breathe, or sleep.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wkBRzPiCC9GVANTR]{Probability Prediction} Reroll one attack roll, save, or check.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.oCZRtcoaUZKR1eSo]{Ray of Exhaustion} Ray makes target exhausted.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.YGkyMwEE6SLfZc4r]{Remove Affliction} Neutralize curses, diseases, infestations, poisons, and other harmful conditions affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nsrp5apjB7X8aOgV]{Resistant Armor, Lesser} Grant DR 5/— or energy resistance 5 against two energy types.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.t8QVxG4WCnd0a9QM]{Shrink Object} You shrink the target item, transmuting it into a smaller version of itself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4prroV3z26u1cy5y]{Slow} One creature per level moves and acts slower.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.SLwl3LWEm2DyzNc4]{Speak with Dead} Corpse answers up to six questions.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nmBeoZQUNcZw7nmy]{Suggestion} Compel a target to follow stated course of action.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uWKhr01bnKxuNRkL]{Tongues} Target can speak and understand any language.

 

4th-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.11X6d8ptU5SKMUQ0]{Baleful Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple targets' shapes to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wSeE9HyAmM7lTdpo]{Confusion} Targets behave randomly for 1 round per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.FTBjUT3rg3Rosn8l]{Control Atmosphere} Alter the corrosiveness, density, or toxicity of the surrounding atmosphere

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yqMZTZSiV3hPIRr6]{Cosmic Eddy} Whirlwind deals 4d6 damage and knocks creatures prone.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.iGe736J1Ri2KsAuH]{Creation} Create one object made of vegetable matter.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.mUIuCkFeMLKnOypt]{Dimension Door} Teleport a short distance.

Dismissal: Force a creature to return to its native plane.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.CO9wzmYbZjeijJUc]{Ectoplasmic Eruption} Swirling psychic matter, known as ectoplasm, erupts from a point you choose.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} All targets within a cone are panicked for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} One creature or object per level falls slowly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.y07M0jd1sVw4uRPh]{Gravity Well} Create a point of high gravity that knocks creatures in the area prone and pulls them closer to the center.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.EWOfxKxvWnG4cn5m]{Hateful Visage} The target’s illusory face grants them a bonus to Intimidate checks and the ability to frighten foes.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.sI0dGecvFmVOPPhn]{Hold Monster} Paralyze one creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ydYnaedLHnVbrZHI]{Invisibility, Greater} Target is invisible for 1 round per level, even if it attacks.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.UQYaZbfgch9AGnJJ]{Miasma} Create air that sickens those who breathe it.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rkVTlYlFQESVWxbJ]{Modify Outcome} You peer across the multiverse at the possible outcomes for this timeline, watching fate branch outward.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zNSqMd0Tq5JY8hwQ]{Planar Binding} Trap an extraplanar creature of CR 4 or lower until it performs a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.w3vQYdl7EZGecOHT]{Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple target's shapes to that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AHfzMTHx9PI4Z4zn]{Reincarnate} Bring a target dead creature back to life in a random body.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ANDdDHLnY7Dfnhtq]{Remove Radioactivity} Remove ongoing radiation effects from a creature or object.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.vYw5lZM5hlUPsyLA]{Resilient Sphere} Force globe protects but traps one target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XaWgkqcJcCeQVbnD]{Resistant Armor} Grant DR 10/— or energy resistance 10 to three energy types.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.t8QVxG4WCnd0a9QM]{Shrink Object} You shrink the target item, transmuting it into a smaller version of itself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.NoIRRaiWVr8xxcJX]{Song Of The Cosmos, Greater} Creatures near you are fascinated or dazzled for 1d4 rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.hnnmUzbxZ8Zxawaf]{Wall of Fire} Blazing curtain deals 2d6 fire damage out to 10 feet and 1d6 fire damage out to 20 feet; passing through the wall deals 5d6 fire damage.

 

5th-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3eLoVyCaQTDB1I6h]{Acid Rain} A storm deals 3d6 damage for 1 round per level, imposes a 50% miss chance, and staggers enemies at its end.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.11X6d8ptU5SKMUQ0]{Baleful Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple targets' shapes to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ECQacpm9nCOg31Hy]{Break Enchantment} Free creatures from curses, enchantments, and transmutations.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.0c25gVm7RKKg1nIy]{Contact Other Plane} Ask questions of extraplanar entity.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.iGe736J1Ri2KsAuH]{Creation} Create a single object made of vegetable or mineral matter.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.MZlIC1Y3pWl690LT]{Crush Skull} Deal 18d8 damage to living creature's head.

Dismissal: Force extraplanar creatures whose total CR is no greater than your level + 2 to return to their native planes.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1FfFraWlxCu1L4rL]{Dispel Magic, Greater} Cancel multiple spells or effects.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} One creature or object per level falls slowly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.sXjHSyos3VIviLhm]{Mislead} Make yourself invisible and create an illusory double of your likeness.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.DcELEg3BAXH3NtsI]{Modify Memory} Change 5 minutes of target's memories.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.pR2g4x8AfohqBotM]{Passwall} Create a passage through most walls.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zNSqMd0Tq5JY8hwQ]{Planar Binding} Trap an extraplanar creature of CR 7 or lower until it performs a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.w3vQYdl7EZGecOHT]{Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple target's shapes to that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.QZiHqGY3BKXoGRry]{Private Sanctum} Prevent anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.IRUPIVT101SvIK6l]{Raise Dead} Restore life to a creature that died no more than 1 day per level ago.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1CnhToMdnMd1PN4G]{Rapid Repair} Construct or weapon regains 2d8 Hit Points per round for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xDxlziIvgoJeMoka]{Reality Bend} Concentrate on an ally, and shift them up to 10 feet once per round when it’s most convenient.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7BFGmL14AeT9SrA6]{Remove Condition, Greater} Remove all harmful conditions affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.D6MCR522HZUBYWSA]{Resistant Aegis} Grant up to 10 creatures DR 5/— or energy resistance 5 to all energy types.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.t8QVxG4WCnd0a9QM]{Shrink Object} You shrink the target item, transmuting it into a smaller version of itself.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.VZpAfh3SIhWndHJl]{Teleport} Instantly teleport as far as 2,000 miles.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.FoaJi0FVcEJpLRWh]{Unwilling Guardian} Charm a target into protecting you during combat.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dVM22xx7CiYWY8XX]{Wall of Force} Invisible wall is difficult to destroy.

 

6th-Level
